participant_1.name: Alex Mercer
participant_1.personality: Introverted and innovative, often lost in thoughts about technology and gaming, with a hint of eccentricity.
participant_1.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water. i am a recluse. i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and stylish, passionate about fashion and luxury, with a resilient spirit despite familial challenges.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.
